int cfs_get_param_paths (glob_t *paths, const char *pattern,...)
 Get parameter path matching the pattern.

Function Documentation

int cfs_get_param_paths ( glob_t *  paths,
const char *  pattern,
  ... 
)

Get parameter path matching the pattern.

Parameters:
[out] paths glob_t structure used to hold the final result
[in] pattern the pattern containing sprintf format specifiers which will be used to create the path to match

The

Parameters:
pattern is appended to the default path glob to complete the absolute path to the file the caller is requesting. If the results point to one or more files that exist those results are stored in the
paths glob_t structure that is passed by the caller.

Lustre tunables traditionally were in /proc/{sys,fs}/{lnet,lustre} but in upstream kernels starting with Linux 4.2 these parameters have been moved to /sys/fs/lustre and /sys/kernel/debug/{lnet,lustre} so the user tools need to check both locations.

Return values:
0 for success, with results stored in
Parameters:
paths. 
Return values:
-1 for failure with errno set to report the reason.
